p.span: Should you have any questions, please contact Evie Rajkovich at

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Registration for 2020-2021

br.span: The district uses the Realtime notification system to send out important school and district announcements, including inclement weather closings or delays. Please be sure to log into your parent portal to review your contact information and update as necessary. You can also set your notification preferences in the portal. If you need assistance with your user credentials please email evelyn.rajkovich@boontonschools.org or call 973-335-9700 ext. 8001. Sign into the parent portal here.
